publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5339.1 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Schools (Health Promotion and Nutrition) (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-5339) in the name of Hugh Henry, insert at end "but, in so doing, believes that, in order to promote healthy eating and improve the diet of the nation, universal free school meals should be provided for all nursery, primary and secondary school pupils in the public sector, and calls on the Scottish Executive to bring forward appropriate amendments at Stage 2 to this effect." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-5339.1 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Schools (Health Promotion and Nutrition) (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-5339) in the name of Hugh Henry, insert at end "but, in so doing, believes that, in order to promote healthy eating and improve the diet of the nation, universal free school meals should be provided for all nursery, primary and secondary school pupils in the public sector, and calls on the Scottish Executive to bring forward appropriate amendments at Stage 2 to this effect."

S2M-5339.1 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Schools (Health Promotion and Nutrition) (Scotland) Bill—As an amendment to motion (S2M-5339) in the name of Hugh Henry, insert at end "but, in so doing, believes that, in order to promote healthy eating and improve the diet of the nation, universal free school meals should be provided for all nursery, primary and secondary school pupils in the public sector, and calls on the Scottish Executive to bring forward appropriate amendments at Stage 2 to this effect."
